mapper.insert: INSERT OVERWRITE INTO "user_labels" (user_id, user_label, avg_amount) SELECT user_id, CASE WHEN t1.user_avg_amount > t2.avg_amount THEN 'high' ELSE 'low' END AS user_label, t1.user_avg_amount AS avg_amount FROM ( SELECT avg(amount) AS user_avg_amount, user_id FROM "orders" GROUP BY user_id ) t1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT avg(amount) AS avg_amount FROM "orders") t2 ON 1 = 1;
